## Assignment

    -   [R and RStudio](https://happygitwithr.com/install-r-rstudio.html)

    -   [Git](https://happygitwithr.com/install-git.html)

-   [Register an account](https://happygitwithr.com/github-acct.html) with [GitHub](www.github.com)

-   Share your GitHub username with the teaching team
